name: mo_n2_pincer
implementation: Tensor Hypercontraction QPE resource estimates based on methodology of arXiv:2011.03494. Note that the truncation error is not included in the error bounds and that the SCF compute time is not included in the preprocessing time. Ground-state overlap is taken to be that estimated for the dominant CSF as estimated by DMRG and that this DMRG runtime is not included in the classical compute costs.
